name: Ultimate Awaken：Will of Fire
description:
Ultimate Awaken: Will of Fire is a brand new anime-themed RPG game. Players can relive the classic episodes and touching stories of the original anime, embark on an adventure in the ninja world, accept quests and challenges, and dive into epic battles with powerful Ninjutsu skills!

Relive Classic Stories!
Complete the classic story dungeon starting from the Konoha Village together with familiar characters. Hit the road to become the strongest ninja!

Enjoy Thrilling Battles!
Make perfect ninja formations with the six types: Fire, Water, Earth, Wind, God and Demon, and plunge into thrilling battles that bring you the ultimate gaming experience.

Build the Mightiest Ninja Team!
Collect hundreds of classic characters in the game, and find companions to fight side by side! Various PVP, PVE, and cross-server team play are waiting for you. You can even challenge powerful opponents on the whole server. Let's fight for glories!

More adventures and thrills are waiting for you to explore. Ninjas, let's go!
